item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Adding row polymorphism to Damas-Hindley-Milner (123 points | 22 comments)

7. USGS uses machine learning to show large lithium potential in Arkansas (289 points | 182 comments)

27. An Illustrated Guide to Maritime Signal Flags (132 points | 31 comments)
28. Explaining color gamuts and color spaces in HDTVs and monitors (5 points | discuss)
29. FTC's rule banning fake online reviews goes into effect (509 points | 287 comments)
30. The PlanetScale vectors public beta (108 points | 26 comments)
